Skills-in: deception +5, insight +4, investigation +5, perception +6, persuasion +5, sleight of hand +4, stealth +4
T1D-in: On each of its turns, the spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.
T2D-in: The spy deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the spy that isn't incapacitated and the spy doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.
A1D-in: The spy makes two melee attacks.
A2D-in: Melee Weapon Attack: + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
A3D-in: Ranged Weapon Attack: + 4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
